holidays.title: Black Lives Matter Day
holidays.description: Let's vow not to have another George Floyd or Trayvon Martin incident.

holidays.title: Carpe Diem Day
holidays.description: Let’s carpe diem and make the most of the present, living life to the fullest.

holidays.title: For Pete's Sake Day
holidays.description: For Pete’s Sake, it’s another fun holiday! Join us as we learn more about the day.

holidays.title: Inconvenience Yourself Day
holidays.description: Get ready to make life a little easier for other people with our tips!

holidays.title: International Tongue Twister Contest Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate International Tongue Twister Contest Day this February.

holidays.title: Kuwait Liberation Day
holidays.description: Let's get together to celebrate Kuwait's freedom and stay committed to peace in the Middle East.

holidays.title: Launceston Cup
holidays.description: Get ready because this is another moment to witness the fantastic horse-racing event in Launceston.

holidays.title: Letter to an Elder Day
holidays.description: The art of letter-writing is honored as a way to send love!

holidays.title: Levi Strauss Day
holidays.description: What makes Levi Strauss Day an important day? Read on, smarty pants!

holidays.title: Maha Shivaratri
holidays.description: Immerse yourself in a day of prayer as we honor an important Hindu god.

holidays.title: Pink Shirt Day Canada
holidays.description: It's time to stand up and stand against bullying today and every other day.

holidays.title: Tell a Fairy Tale Day
holidays.description: Chill and enjoy reliving magical moments and moral lessons from the captivating fairy tales!

holidays.title: Thermos Bottle Day
holidays.description: Learn about this exceptional product as we cool off and warm up on Thermos Bottle Day

holidays.title: Duke Dennis’s Birthday
holidays.description: Find out more about this social media personality's life and rise to fame.

holidays.title: Erykah Badu’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this musical genius and show stopping performer, greatness has already been achieved.

holidays.title: Eva Cudmore’s Birthday
holidays.description: This TikTok star and influencer is new on the scene and she’s already making waves.

holidays.title: Johnny Cash’s Birthday
holidays.description: This icon burned brightest. Now, he rests in the company of heavenly stars.
